summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Belmont Avenue North from the north line of East Roy Street to Lakeview Avenue, in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 13196, creating Local Improvement District No. 1194 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
